title: signup rejects duplicate email or username
description: Test the /auth/signup endpoint to ensure it rejects registration attempts with duplicate email or username, returning a 409 Conflict error.

title: login returns valid jwt and user info on success
description: Test the /auth/login endpoint to verify it returns a valid JWT token and user information upon successful login, and returns 401 Unauthorized on failure.

title: get user profile returns accurate data and handles case insensitivity
description: Test the /users/{username} GET endpoint to ensure it returns the correct user profile data including isFollowing status, handles case insensitivity in username, and returns 404 if user not found.

title: update user profile applies partial and full updates correctly
description: Test the /users/profile PATCH endpoint to verify that partial and full updates to user profile fields (name, bio, location, website, avatar, coverImage) are applied correctly and are idempotent.

title: follow user updates social graph and prevents invalid operations
description: Test the /users/{id}/follow POST endpoint to confirm that following a user updates follower and following counts correctly and prevents invalid operations such as following oneself.

title: unfollow user updates social graph correctly
description: Test the /users/{id}/follow DELETE endpoint to ensure unfollowing a user updates follower and following counts correctly.

title: create tweet supports text images and replies
description: Test the /tweets POST endpoint to verify tweet creation supports text content, optional images, and replies via parentId, and returns correct relationship data.

title: get tweets filters by authorid and exclude replies
description: Test the /tweets GET endpoint to ensure it correctly filters tweets by authorId and excludes replies when excludeReplies parameter is true.

title: like and unlike tweet updates counts and authorization
description: Test the /tweets/{id}/like POST and DELETE endpoints to verify liking and unliking tweets updates like counts correctly and enforces proper authorization.

title: upload file accepts valid images and returns accessible url
description: Test the /uploads POST endpoint to confirm it accepts valid image files, uploads them successfully, and returns accessible URLs in the response.
